pullRequest.title: Fixed the video outline in the theodul player
pullRequest.bodyText: This PR should fix the uneven outline of videos in the theodul player. Before, the outline on the right side would often be thicker as the other ones.

commit.message: Fixed the video outline in the theodul player

nodes.bodyText: I'm not very familiar with the code but this does not seem to be related to the issue you describe. This controls the overall height, doesn't it? Should this be removed?
